instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data: Scrape off all loose, scaling, flaking, and peeling paint manually or by using BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141, as necessary. Wash surfaces clean and completely remove chemical residue. Let it dry. For repainting concrete with chalky old paint, use BOYSEN®® Chalk Blocker™ B‑7304 as surface conditioner. In case of mildew infestation, treat with a bleach solution (1:3, laundry bleach to water, respectively) by swabbing or brushing. To ensure proper treatment, let stand for 24 hours before cleaning off residue. Let dry. Surface to be repainted should be clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dust and dirt, and all possible contaminants.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Option 1: BOYSEN®® Elasti-Kote without Reinforcing Membrane Sealer (for resulting bare substrate): BOYSEN®® Elasti-kote™ Sealer B‑5800 Putty: BOYSEN®® Elasti-kote™ Putty B‑5811 Basecoat (1 to 2 coats): BOYSEN®® Elasti-kote™ Basecoat B‑5805 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Elasti-Kote Topcoat B‑5815 Option 2: BOYSEN®® Elasti-Kote without Reinforcing Membrane Sealer (for resulting bare substrate): BOYSEN®® Elasti-kote™ Sealer B‑5800 Putty: BOYSEN®® Elasti-kote™ Putty B‑5811 1st Basecoat: BOYSEN®® Elasti-kote™ Basecoat B‑5805 Reinforcing Membrane: Fibermesh Matting (1.2mm x 60g/sqm x 1m x 100m) 2nd Basecoat: BOYSEN®® Elasti-kote™ Basecoat B‑5805 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Elasti-Kote Topcoat B‑5815

instructions.title: SERVICE CONDITIONS
instructions.data: Preferably applied by a BOYSEN®® accredited painting contractor. Tinting is not recommended. All colors should be factory-mixed.

calculator.title: Reinforcing Membrane: Fiber Mesh Matting (1.2mm x 60g/sqm x 1m x 100m)
